articles.author: cleaf2013
articles.title: We know something essential about the coronavirus. We’re not doing anything about it
articles.description: We know some essential information about how pathogens like coronavirus spread. The president's budgetary priorities don't reflect that knowledge.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: The Chinese province at the heart of the coronavirus outbreak changes how it counts cases—again
articles.description: The change raises questions over the reliability of data from the epicenter of the outbreak.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: Billionaires are donating millions to fight China’s coronavirus. But where is the money going?
articles.description: Bill Gates and Jack Ma have pledged funds, but is China's NGO environment equipped to handle such donations?

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: Fecal transmission may be responsible for coronavirus’s rapid spread
articles.description: Scientists suspect a fecal-oral route for coronavirus that's infected tens of thousands worldwide.
